3: The heroes are here!
Lucia, Lee, and Kamui were surrounded by armed villagers before they even entered the village.
What's going on...?
Freeze, you bloody 'heroes'!
I think we are supposed to be the heroes you are talking about. But why the hostility...?
Stop bluffing. Your friends—the other group of 'heroes'—just seized all the recovery potions of another village nearby! They claimed to have the King's order!
Wow, so this is the type of game where we can't just take anything we want...
That's the last thing you should be surprised about.
Dammit!
The villagers became even more emotional as they talked. The other group of heroes must have done a lot of horrible things.
Lucia, I think they are probably referring to Vera's team.
Yeah, I guess so.
I can't rule out the possibility that Liv was there, but based on the response of these villagers, only Vera would do such thing...
I must apologize for what they did. But we are different from them. Please let me explain...
Enough said! The other village was attacked right when they were listening to the 'explanation'!
Lucia wanted to explain, but the already prepared villagers started attacking regardless.
Don't worry, this happens a lot in games. Just control your power and beat them up!
You are only smart in games, Kamui.
Hehe, thanks!
That wasn't meant to be a compliment...
